turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to schedule a check-up appointment with Dr. Miller.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that.  What days and times are you available?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Well, I work Monday through Friday, 9 to 5.  So, evenings or weekends would be best.  Is Dr. Miller available on weekends?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me check... Unfortunately, Dr. Miller doesn't see patients on weekends. However, we have availability on Tuesday and Thursday evenings from 5:30 PM onwards. Would either of those times work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, that's frustrating. Those evenings are tough for me.  Are there *any* other doctors in the practice who might be available on a Saturday?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, let me check.  It looks like Dr. Johnson has appointments available on Saturdays. Would you like me to find a time for you with her? What kind of physician is Dr. Miller, anyway?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Dr. Miller is my primary care physician. That's why I was trying to stay with him. I'm generally hesitant to go to a doctor I don't know, but I suppose it can't be helped. Yes, please make an appointment with Dr. Johnson. Is she good?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Dr. Johnson is also a primary care physician and has excellent ratings from our patients. What day and time would you like for your appointment? I can see Saturday, October 26th at 10:00 AM or 1:00 PM are available.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, 10:00 AM on October 26th works perfectly. Please confirm the appointment details, and send me the confirmation information.
